DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether improve corn-soya blend ( CSB+ ) new formulate ready-to-use supplementary food ( RUSF ) effective treatment moderate acute malnutrition child .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Nutritional Products Treat Moderate Acute Malnutrition
DOC.detailed_description: Assuming availability food household , caregiver instruct best use food quantity supplementary food distribute calculate provide 50 % child energy requirement .
DOC.criteria: Children age 659 month Weightforheight 3 2 zscores without edema Good appetite Stable clinical condition WeightforHeight Zscore < 3 Presence bilateral pit edema Unstable clinical condition Not show appetite
